column5: Anyone know how to get a hold of the old camp manager Kevin. I heard that a group brought him up there last year and did very well. I have a group that will be going there the same week next year and would like to try and get in touch with him. Thank you
Send me your email and I will try to get his # and/or email. He knows those lakes like the back of his hand.
my email is [email protected] Thank you for the response I look forward to hearing from you. Chad
